BasicInfo.short: PicBackMan is a photo and video uploading website.

Products.name: PicBackMan - Google Drive Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Google Drive is a Google Drive Uploader that enables you to create automatic and effortless photo and video backups.

Products.name: Box Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Box is a Box Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups / bulk uploads to your Box account.

Products.name: Picasa Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Picasa is a Picasa Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups of your Picasa albums.

Products.name: SkyDrive Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for SkyDrive is a SkyDrive Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups / bulk uploads to your

Products.name: SmugMug Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan's SmugMug Uploader is an Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups / bulk uploads to your SmugMug

Products.name: Photobucket Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Photobucket is a Photobucket Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups / bulk uploads to your

Products.name: Flickr Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Flickr is a Flickr Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups.

Products.name: Facebook Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Facebook is a Facebook Photo Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups as well as bulk uploads

Products.name: Dropbox Uploader
Products.description: PicBackMan for Dropbox is a Dropbox Uploader that enables automatic and effortless photo and video backups / bulk uploads to your Dropbox
